patch 8.1.2285: padding in structures wastes memory

Problem:    Padding in structures wastes memory.
Solution:   Move fields to avoid padding. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5202)

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2285: padding in structures wastes memory · vim/vim@d6beab0

text:

patch 8.1.2286: using border highlight in popup window leaks memory

Problem:    Using border highlight in popup window leaks memory.
Solution:   Free memory before overwriting. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5203)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2286: using border highlight in popup window leaks memory · vim/vim@622b646
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2286: using border highlight in popup window leaks memory · vim/vim@622b646
attachments.text: Problem: Using border highlight in popup window leaks memory. Solution: Free memory before overwriting. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5203)

patch 8.1.2274: newlines in 'balloonexpr' result only work in the GUI

Problem:    Newlines in 'balloonexpr' result only work in the GUI.
Solution:   Also recognize newlines in the terminal. (closes #5193)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1e15e61188e14ba67060c09d4c74e9b587016230|patch 8.1.2275: using "seesion" looks like a mistake>
patch 8.1.2275: using "seesion" looks like a mistake

Problem:    Using "seesion" looks like a mistake.
Solution:   Use an underscore to make the function sort first.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2275: using "seesion" looks like a mistake · vim/vim@1e15e61
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2275: using "seesion" looks like a mistake · vim/vim@1e15e61
attachments.text: Problem: Using "seesion" looks like a mistake. Solution: Use an underscore to make the function sort first.

patch 8.1.2276: MS-Windows: session test leaves files behind

Problem:    MS-Windows: session test leaves files behind.
Solution:   Wipe out buffers before deleting the directory. (closes #5187)

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2276: MS-Windows: session test leaves files behind · vim/vim@5bf46e9
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows: session test leaves files behind. Solution: Wipe out buffers before deleting the directory. (closes #5187)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b73e439606b55d66d9e81da1f9cae729af37cf04|patch 8.1.2277: terminal window is not updated when info popup changes>
patch 8.1.2277: terminal window is not updated when info popup changes

Problem:    Terminal window is not updated when info popup changes.
Solution:   Redraw windows when re-using an info popup. (closes #5192)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2277: terminal window is not updated when info popup changes · vim/vim@b73e439
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2277: terminal window is not updated when info popup changes · vim/vim@b73e439
attachments.text: Problem: Terminal window is not updated when info popup changes. Solution: Redraw windows when re-using an info popup. (closes #5192)

patch 8.1.2278: using "cd" with "exe" may fail

Problem:    Using "cd" with "exe" may fail.
Solution:   Use chdir() instead.

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2278: using "cd" with "exe" may fail · vim/vim@3503d7c

patch 8.1.2279: computation of highlight attributes is too complicated

Problem:    Computation of highlight attributes is too complicated.
Solution:   Simplify the attribute computation and make it more consistent.
            (closes #5190)  Fix that 'combine' set to zero doesn't work.
